    • Method Detail

      • schemaCreate

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> schemaCreate(String sourceId,
                                                      String schemaName,
                                                      String version,
                                                      String data,
                                                      int paymentHandle)
                                               throws VcxException

        Create a new Schema object and publish correspondent record on the ledger.

        Parameters:
        sourceId - Enterprise's personal identification for the user.
        schemaName - version of schema.
        version - version of schema.
        data - list of attributes that will make up the schema (the number of attributes should be less or equal than 125).
        paymentHandle - future use (currently uses any address in the wallet). 
        Example schema_data -> "["attr1", "attr2", "attr3"]".

        Returns:
        schema object, written to ledger. 
        
  Example:
  // Schema Create
         String schemaData = JsonPath.parse("{" +
                 "  schema_name: 'degree_schema'," +
                 "  schema_version: '" + version + "'," +
                 "  attributes: ['name', 'last_name', 'date', 'degree', 'age']" +
                 "}").jsonString();
         int schemaHandle = SchemaApi.schemaCreate("schema_uuid", // Schema Create
                 JsonPath.read(schemaData, "$.schema_name"),
                 JsonPath.read(schemaData, "$.schema_version"),
                 JsonPath.parse((List)JsonPath.read(schemaData, "$.attributes")).jsonString(),
                 0).get();
  // Get Schema ID
         String schemaId = SchemaApi.schemaGetSchemaId(schemaHandle).get();
  // Schema Serialize
         String schema = SchemaApi.schemaSerialize(schemaHandle).get();
  // Add Record Wallet
         WalletApi.addRecordWallet("schema", "defaultSchema", schema).get();
  // Schema Release
         SchemaApi.schemaRelease(schemaHandle);
   }
        Throws:
        VcxException
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        VCX JAVA Demo - Schema Create Example

      • schemaSerialize

        public static CompletableFuture<String> schemaSerialize(int schemaHandle)
                                                 throws VcxException

        Serialize the object for storage.


        Takes the schema object and returns a json string of all its attributes
        See schemaCreate(String, String, String, String, int) example for reference.
        Parameters:
        schemaHandle - Schema handle that was provided during creation. Used to access schema object.
        Returns:
        serialized object 
                 Serialized Schema:
         {
          "version": "1.0",
          "data": {
              "data": [
                  "name",
                  "last_name",
                  "date",
                  "degree",
                  "age"
                  ],
              "version": "59.4.40",
              "schema_id": "Th7MpTaRZVRYnPiabds81Y:2:degree_schema:59.4.40",
              "name": "degree_schema",
              "source_id": "schema_uuid",
              "state": 1
              }
          }
        Throws:
        VcxException
        See Also:
        "Refer schemaCreate example for credential demo", schemaCreate(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)

      • schemaDeserialize

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> schemaDeserialize(String schemaData)
                                                    throws VcxException

        Create the object from a previously serialized object.


        Takes a json string representing a schema object and recreates an object matching the json.
        Attributes are provided by a previous call to the serialize function.
        See schemaCreate(String, String, String, String, int) example for reference.
        Parameters:
        schemaData - json string representing a schema object.
        Returns:
        A re-instantiated object 
                 Serialized Schema:
         {
          "version": "1.0",
          "data": {
              "data": [
                  "name",
                  "last_name",
                  "date",
                  "degree",
                  "age"
                  ],
              "version": "59.4.40",
              "schema_id": "Th7MpTaRZVRYnPiabds81Y:2:degree_schema:59.4.40",
              "name": "degree_schema",
              "source_id": "schema_uuid",
              "state": 1
              }
          }
        Throws:
        VcxException
        Since:
        1.0

      • schemaGetAttributes

        public static CompletableFuture<String> schemaGetAttributes(String sourceId,
                                                            String schemaId)
                                                     throws VcxException

        Retrieves all of the data associated with a schema on the ledger.


        Parameters:
        sourceId - Enterprise's personal identification for the user.
        schemaId - id of schema given during the creation of the schema.
        Returns:
        Completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException
        Since:
        1.0

      • schemaGetSchemaId

        public static CompletableFuture<String> schemaGetSchemaId(int schemaHandle)
                                                   throws VcxException
        Retrieves schema's id
        Parameters:
        schemaHandle - Schema handle that was provided during creation. Used to access proof object
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer schemaCreate example for credential demo", schemaCreate(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)

      • schemaRelease

        public static int schemaRelease(int schemaHandle)
                         throws VcxException
        Releases the schema object by de-allocating memory
        Parameters:
        schemaHandle - Schema handle that was provided during creation. Used to access schema object
        Returns:
        Success
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        See Also:
        "Refer schemaCreate example for credential demo", schemaCreate(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)

      • schemaPrepareForEndorser

        public static CompletableFuture<SchemaPrepareForEndorserResult> schemaPrepareForEndorser(String sourceId,
                                                                                         String schemaName,
                                                                                         String version,
                                                                                         String data,
                                                                                         String endorser)
                                                                                  throws VcxException
        Create a new Schema object that will be published by Endorser later.
        Note that Schema can't be used for credential issuing until it will be published on the ledger.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - Enterprise's personal identification for the user.
        schemaName - version of schema.
        version - version of schema.
        data - list of attributes that will make up the schema (the number of attributes should be less or equal than 125).
        endorser - DID of the Endorser that will submit the transaction.
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        Since:
        1.0

      • schemaUpdateState

        public static CompletableFuture<Integer> schemaUpdateState(int schemaHandle)
                                                    throws VcxException
        Checks if schema is published on the Ledger and updates the state
        Parameters:
        schemaHandle - Schema handle that was provided during creation. Used to access schema object
        Returns:
        completable future
        Throws:
        VcxException - Thrown if an error occurs when calling the underlying SDK.
        Since:
        1.0
